aside.overwrite_votes_left: You can correct your vote up to {{ left }} times.

banner.subtitle: Use wallet addresses, vote with an ERC20 token or with NFTs!
banner.title: Voting for DAOs & Web3 communities

banner_voting_types.anonymous_description: Your voters will be totally anonymous, thanks to the zk- proofs technology. Privacy should be normal.
banner_voting_types.flexible_description: Tailor your voting process & census: single choice, quadratic voting, vote with wallet list or create a custom census.
banner_voting_types.token_description: Vote with ERC20/ERC721 (NFT's) or import your own token and vote gasless with them.

actions.cancel: Cancel the process immediately, not allowing new votes and not counting any results (caution: it cannot be reverted)
actions.continue: Resume the process immediately, in case it has been paused
actions.end: End the process immediately, preventing new votes to be submitted, and shows the voting results (caution: it cannot be reverted)
actions.error_title: There was some error while executing the transaction
actions.pause: Pause the voting process temporarily, until resumed manually. While the process is paused, voters cannot submit votes.

cc.empty: Apparently this process has no questions

results.secret_until_the_end: Secret until the end. The results will be available when the process ends at {{ endDate }}
results.title: Results for "{{ title }}"

vote.missing_answers: You have to answer all the questions
vote.voted_description: To verify your vote, you can use this unique id: {{ id }}

error.invalid_cell_data: Some rows do not contain correct addresses: {{rows,list(style:short)}}
error.invalid_row_length: Correct document lines {{rows,list(style: short)}} and load it again
error.invalid_weight_type: Expecting weight in first column at lines {{rows,list(style:short)}}, but found unexpected data
error.not_found: Sorry, the page you were looking for was not found

error_text: Sorry, the page you were looking for was not found

account_create.description_helper: A brief description of your organization

error.min_address: Please, provide at least one address

overwrite.description: Vote overwrite: Allow voters to correct the vote once.
overwrite.title: Vote overwrite

secret.description: Secret: Results will be available only after the voting is closed.
secret.title: Secret

calendar.end_date_description: This election will start at {{ date.begin, format }} and end at {{ date.end, format }}, lasting ~{{ date, duration }}
calendar.start_date_description: Specify the active period for receiving votes. Select 'Now' to make the proposal immediately active after publishing.
calendar.title: Calendar

census.description: Select how will the voters authenticate and identify themselves. Choose between custom data (CSV), by owning a token or by wallet addresses.
census.spreadsheet_description: Custom data like user and password or voter personal info.
census.title: Choose your census
census.token_base_description: Use a token (EVM based) to let users vote based on the amount they own.
census.wallet_address_description: Identify your voters by their wallets addresses. They will have to log in with a wallet provider like Metamask.

confirm.census_preview_is_shortened: (preview list is limited to {{ limit }} results)
confirm.census_total_people_one: A single person will be elegible for voting in this election
confirm.census_total_people_other: {{ count }} people will be elegible for voting in this election
confirm.confirmation_terms_and_conditions: I accept the <link>Terms and Conditions</link> of Vocdoni
confirm.confirmation_valid_info: I assure that this information is correct and valid
confirm.title: Title

process_create.confirm_spreadsheet_removal: Are you sure? Take in mind that the uploaded file will be removed
process_create.do_not_close: This action can take some time, don't close this tab

meta.description: Provide a clear title & description. This will help voters understand the purpose of the vote.
meta.description_helper: A brief description of your election
meta.title: Election Info

question.description_placeholder: Write here a description of the question (optional)

spreadsheet.download_template_description: Download the original template to complete your voter list

preview.description: Members must complete this form to access the voting
preview.title: Form preview
preview.upload_new_list: Upload a new list of voters

requirements.list_one: The first row will be used as the name of the fields that voters will need to fill out.
requirements.list_two: Fields do not distinguish between uppercase and lowercase letters, white spaces will be ignored, and diacritics will be transformed into simple letters.
requirements.list_three: If 'Weighted Vote' is selected, the first column must be an integer indicating the voter's vote weight.
requirements.title: Requirements

process_create.success_description: Redirecting you to the election process page...
process_create.unhealthy_account: You need to create an organization before creating the first election.

elections_list_empty.description: Being by making your first election, you can choose between diferent auth types of your vote
elections_list_empty.footer: Learn more about creating elections <link>in this guide</link>.
elections_list_empty.not_owner: This organization has no elections yet
elections_list_empty.title: Create your first election

process.is_invalid: This process has wrong data, thus making it invalid

status.paused_description: It's not possible to vote right now

uploader.click_or_drag_and_drop: <p1>Upload or drag and drop the voter list here</p1><p2>(Allowed formats: CSV, XLSX, and ODS)</p2>
